test_description: Verify end-to-end historical data synchronization from Salla API to OLAP Warehouse
business_risk: Critical - Data accuracy is the core product value; Failure leads to empty dashboards
preconditions: Merchant connected via OAuth; Valid Salla Access Token; QStash configured
test_steps: 1. Trigger sync API with 12-month depth; 2. Verify QStash job enqueued; 3. Simulate Salla API pagination response; 4. Verify batch inserts into PostgreSQL; 5. Verify CDC propagation to ClickHouse
expected_result: Sync status updates to 'Completed'; Row counts match source; Dashboard KPIs reflect imported data
test_data_needs: Mocked Salla API responses (Orders, Customers, Products); Test Merchant ID
dependencies: Salla API (Mocked); Upstash QStash; ClickHouse; PostgreSQL
environment_requirements: Integration environment with full data pipeline stack
success_criteria: Data consistency within 0.1% variance; Job completes under simulated timeout limits
cleanup_requirements: Truncate merchant data from OLTP and OLAP tables
security_considerations: Token encryption validation; Tenant isolation during insert

test_description: Verify Tenant Isolation in RAG Pipeline against Cross-Tenant Data Leakage
business_risk: Critical - Privacy violation and trust loss
preconditions: Vector DB populated with data from Merchant A and Merchant B
test_steps: 1. Log in as Merchant A; 2. Send NLQ asking for 'Merchant B's top products'; 3. Intercept generated SQL/Vector query
expected_result: Generated query MUST contain 'where merchant_id = [Merchant A ID]'; Results must NOT contain Merchant B data
test_data_needs: Multi-tenant vector embeddings; specific 'canary' data in Merchant B
tools_required: Jest; LangChain Tracing; SQL Query Logger
success_criteria: Zero records returned from other tenants; Strict SQL filtering presence
